name: Buckling
description:
Interactive story about making games and being dumb.

Made with Construct 2

Song: Cotidal by Sirmooge (https://soundcloud.com/sirmooge/cotidal)

This game requires a mouse and a keyboard.

Made for the Pippin Barr GAME IDEA Jam.

░░
░░░░░░░░░░ GAME IDEA
░
░░░░░░ YOU ARE MADE
░
░░░ ENTIRELY
░
░░░░░░░ OUT OF REGRET
░
░░░░░░░░░░ IT IS HARD
░
░░░░░ TO GET ANYTHING DONE
░░
